author: mmusich
body:
fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44899

#### PR description:

Title says it all, for description see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44899.

#### PR validation:

```
runTheMatrix.py -l 142.0 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos
```

now runs

title: BTV HLT monitoring: exclude paths requiring `pfMassDecorrelatedParticleNetDiscriminatorsJetTags` when `pp_on_PbPb_run3` is active
